page.title: 04CREWE ROLLERS BMX TRACK
page.content: {Crewe Rollers BMX track}is built on Tipkinder park Crewe .It cost Â£10,000 to build and to pay for facilities such as toilets,showers and changing rooms. The track is made of red ash with red and white painted tyres surrounding the whole track.On site there are two big caravans one is for sorting out booking-in and points and the other is the clubs snack bar. There is a P.A.system also used for race meetings. Any BMX bike is permitted to be ridden as long as the rider wears a{crash {hat,gloves and sliders.}Races are held every friday and sunday hail rain or shine.There is unlimited parking space for any vehicle.{ { {
